title: Low costs na avia\c{c}\~ao: import\^ancia e desdobramentos
abstract: arXiv:2402.11372v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This study aims to discuss the impacts of a low-cost airline on the air transport market and, especially, to present the most recent findings from specialized literature in the field. To this end, various works on this topic, published since 2015, were selected and analyzed. From this analysis, it was possible to categorize the main topics discussed in the papers into five groups: (i) the impacts of a low-cost airline on competing airlines; (ii) impacts on airports; (iii) general impacts on the demand for air transport; (iv) effects on passengers' choice process; and (v) general effects on a geographical region.

Abstract: arXiv:2402.11372v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This study aims to discuss the impacts of a low-cost airline on the air transport market and, especially, to present the most recent findings from specialized literature in the field. translated_title: 低成本航空：重要性和影响
translated_abstract: 该研究旨在讨论低成本航空对航空运输市场的影响，特别是介绍领域内专业文献的最新研究成果。为此，选取并分析了自2015年以来发表的关于该主题的各种作品。通过这一分析，将论文中讨论的主要话题归类为五个组别：(i) 低成本航空对竞争航空公司的影响；(ii) 对机场的影响；(iii) 对航空运输需求的总体影响；(iv) 对乘客选择过程的影响；以及(v) 对地理区域的总体影响。
tldr: 论文讨论了低成本航空对航空市场的影响，并总结出对竞争对手、机场、航空需求、乘客选择和地理区域的影响分类。
